High strength, defense and HP, the warrior is\neffective at dealing damage and protecting allies.\nCan equip  one-handed swords, two-handed swords and axes.
Whipping Boy, Morale Masher
Critical Claim
A specialist with recovery spells they can also deal\nrepectable physical damage.\nAble to equip a spears, staves and clubs.
Heal, Benediction, Alma Mater
Saint's Song
A specialist with offensive magic. Able to wield\ntwo-handed staves, daggers and whips.
Frizz, Wizard Ward, Spooky Aura
O Zone
Utilizes tension to increase power, with exceptional\nstrength and speed.\nAble to equip claws, clubs and fans.
Psyche Up, Mens Sana, Meditation
Roaring Tirade
A good all-arounder he has good physical strength\nand high speed. Can steal items from enemies.\nAble to equip daggers, whips and claws.
Half-inch, Nose for Treasure
Itemized Kill

Ogres, the People of Fire
They live strong in the harsh lands, with large bodies, horns and tails.
They are belligerent, respect the strong\nand use their superior strength and\nstamina to risk their lives for the weak.

Pukulipo, People of Flowers
In a town with colors like a picture book, they have fluffy, adorable little bodies living in search of fun.
Born with strong magical power and dexterity,\nthey are more passionate about creating things\nfor fun than for fighting.

Elves, People of Wind
They are beautiful people with wings on their back who love nature and live with the forest.
They value tradition, studied the ways\nof the world, and produced many excellent\nspellcasters.

Dwarves, People of Earth
They live with the earth, blessed by the majestic mountains, with small bodies and big ears.
With their high technology and strong desires,\nthey built many advanced civilizations with\ntheir pure dexterity and speed.

Weddie, People of Water
They live freely on beautiful islands in the sea and their bodies are blue like water.
They hate constraints and value singing and love.\nThey use their speed and strength to fight only\nwhen they have to protect those they love.
